categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Thranc Roulus was a soldier of the Sith Empire stationed in the Kwenn system during Eradication Day. During the attack by the Eradicator weapons the personnel tried to abandon the burning station, but Sith Lord Phaaral threatened to kill any deserters attempting to flee. In an attempt to save his life Thranc, who had a family in Kaas City, contacted Imperial forces through remote transmission, trying to get a valid order to evacuate from somebody else.
